description: The Maruti Suzuki Alto K10 is India's most affordable car with modern features, excellent fuel efficiency, and reliable performance for city driving.
pros: Most affordable car, excellent fuel efficiency, low maintenance, wide service network
cons: Basic interiors, limited features, poor highway performance

description: The Maruti Suzuki Swift is a premium hatchback known for its sporty design, peppy performance, and feature-rich interiors.
pros: Sporty design, peppy performance, feature-rich, good build quality
cons: Rear seat space, road noise at high speeds

description: The Maruti Suzuki Baleno is a premium hatchback offering spacious interiors, advanced features, and excellent fuel efficiency.
pros: Spacious interiors, feature-rich, good fuel efficiency, premium feel
cons: Rear seat comfort, road noise, average build quality

description: The Maruti Suzuki Dzire is India's best-selling compact sedan known for its fuel efficiency, spacious cabin, and reliable performance.
pros: Best-in-class fuel efficiency, spacious cabin, reliable, wide service network
cons: Basic interiors, average build quality, road noise

description: The Maruti Suzuki Vitara Brezza is a compact SUV offering SUV styling, good ground clearance, and excellent fuel efficiency.
pros: SUV styling, good ground clearance, fuel efficient, reliable
cons: Limited power, basic interiors, average ride quality

description: The Hyundai i10 Nios is a feature-rich hatchback offering modern design, spacious interiors, and advanced connectivity features.
pros: Feature-rich, spacious interiors, modern design, good build quality
cons: Higher maintenance cost, average fuel efficiency

description: The Hyundai i20 is a premium hatchback with modern design, advanced features, and excellent build quality.
pros: Premium design, feature-rich, good build quality, spacious interiors
cons: Higher maintenance cost, average fuel efficiency

description: The Hyundai Venue is a compact SUV offering bold design, connected car technology, and premium features in a compact package.
pros: Bold design, connected features, premium interiors, good build quality
cons: Compact size, firm ride quality, higher maintenance

description: The Hyundai Creta is a mid-size SUV known for its premium design, feature-rich interiors, and strong road presence.
pros: Premium design, feature-rich, spacious, strong road presence
cons: Higher maintenance cost, average fuel efficiency

description: The Tata Tiago is a stylish hatchback offering modern design, spacious interiors, and excellent safety features at an affordable price.
pros: Stylish design, spacious interiors, good safety, affordable
cons: Average fuel efficiency, limited service network
